definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to be defeated/to lose/to fail (e.g. experiments)/failure/defeat/CL:次[ci4]
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to suffer a defeat/to fail/to fall behind
to thwart/to foil (sb's plans)/a setback/a failure/a defeat
(literary) to be routed (in a war)/to suffer defeat (in sports etc)
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
(of a plot etc) to fall through and stand exposed

sentences.english: He leaves with a record of 39-6 with 30 knockouts .
sentences.chinese: 他留下了创记录的39胜6败，30次击倒对手。

sentences.english: No thing could damp his spirits.
sentences.chinese: 任何事都不能败他的兴。

sentences.english: Disregarding in the hereafter's able and failing, in me, in the heart, I have already engraved you.
sentences.chinese: 不论以后的成与败，在我心里，我已经把你给刻上了。

sentences.english: I believe it is important to separate good failures from bad failures.
sentences.chinese: 我认为分辩精采的失踪败与欠好的失踪败很主要。

sentences.english: I believe it is important to separate good failures from bad failures.
sentences.chinese: 我认为分辩精采的失踪败与欠好的失踪败很主要。

sentences.english: The flower opens and failure, the memory of the brand is still in fills the air.
sentences.chinese: 花开了又败，记忆的烙印却依旧在缭绕。

sentences.english: Flustered, they escaped to the magic curse Wang Zhigu.
sentences.chinese: 慌乱之中，他们逃入了被魔法诅咒的败王之谷。

sentences.english: Flavor Many foes have fallen to Weeble's wrath.
sentences.chinese: 许多敌人败在薇布儿的盛怒之下。

sentences.english: This shield of dairy ingredients has a natural emulating effect and prevents rancidity of the fat.
sentences.chinese: 奶膜具有天然的仿真效果，并可以防止脂肪酸败。

sentences.english: Mets fall to 2-41, continuing slide that started in September of 2007.
sentences.chinese: 大都会接续上一季九月的表现，累计2胜41败。

sentences.english: I'm surprised that he should have failed.
sentences.chinese: 他竟至掉败了，这使我很受惊。

sentences.english: Picking flowers when it folds instead of letting it withered.
sentences.chinese: 花开堪折方须折，莫让鲜花败残枝。

sentences.english: This is a battle that the smaller independent agencies have largely lost.
sentences.chinese: 在这场较劲中，范畴较小的独立代理商已根本上告败。

sentences.english: Hope you are not so tired after such a tougher journey!
sentences.chinese: 今天很失败，败在“舟车劳顿，一路辛苦”。

sentences.english: What if you don't lose your ass?
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有败的一塌糊涂呢？

sentences.english: Only a decisive battle can settle the question as to which army is the victor and which the vanquished.
sentences.chinese: 只有决战，才能解决两军之间谁胜谁败的问题。

definition: consecutive defeats/to lose several times in a row
to lose to (sb)/to be outdone by

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to be utterly defeated/to be routed
to suffer a defeat/to fail/to fall behind
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
end/conclusion/to come to an end/to terminate (sth)
total victory/to excel by far/name of a tank/slam
